name: Blocklings (Daniel Thomas [AbroadGames])
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 43.

A short game about morphing blocks escaping from a dungeon deep underground. However, not all of them will be able to make it to the top.

Features:

- Bouncy Animated Blocks with 3 shapes they can take each with their own trait

- Low poly art style

- 8bit inspired sound effects and soundtrack

- Puzzle focused game-play with replay-ability to get the best score

- 4 Levels

Tips:

- The Blockling highlighted in Green is the current leader and is the one effected by the selected change. 

- Blocklings will stay in the air once they change.

- After getting one blockling to the end you can fast foward the rest.

Tools Used:

Blender (Models, Texturing etc)

Beepboop (SoundTrack)

LapChirp (SoundEffects)

Unity3D (Well.. The game itself I guess)

Source Code: https://github.com/AbroadGames/Blockings-LudumDare43-
